metadata.name: Isekai Anime Characters #001
metadata.description: "Isekai Anime Characters". are handmade NFTs where each character were carefully designed one by one. The first editions (Genesis 0) will be limited to only 50 in the world. We look forward to offers from passionate fans with the desire to spread Japanese anime culture to the world through crypto art. *Please write your passionate thoughts about the world-class Japanese anime culture in your OpenSea profile!
